context: Analyze this standing pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Warrior II (Virabhadrasana II) Wide-legged standing pose with arms parallel to ground. Consider the Leg strength, hip opening, shoulder stability. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Wide-legged standing pose with arms parallel to ground
practitioner.primaryFocus: Leg strength, hip opening, shoulder stability

specificNeeds: Leg strength, hip opening, shoulder stability
